original: gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa'i spyi bzhin du don dam pa pa'i gcig ni de ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa'i spyi bzhin du don dam pa pa'i gcig ni de ma yin no //
translated: But the ultimate is not like that, which is imagined by others.

original: don dam par ni chos rnams med cing chos nyid kyang med de de rnams kyi gzhan dang gzhan min pa dag kyang med do zhes bshad do //
analyzed: don dam par ni chos rnams med cing chos nyid kyang med de de rnams kyi gzhan dang gzhan min pa dag kyang med do zhes bshad do //

original: stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang stong pa nyid bzhin du de kho na nyid du brjod cing de kho na yang byang chub kyi sems te /

original: de'i phyir de yang khyab par byed pa kho na'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de yang khyab par byed pa kho na'o zhes pa'o //

analyzed: nye bar len pa dang nye bar blang bya dag rigs mtshungs pa nyid kho na'o //

analyzed: bde ba chen po de yang ji ltar las kyi gtum mo la sogs pa'i thabs kyi dbye ba gang gis bdag nyid la rnam par rtog pa rnams bsal nas gnas par 'gyur ba de ltar bla ma rnams 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dag rnam par phye nas 'chad par

original: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma gsum pa'o /
analyzed: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma gsum pa'o /

original: // / byang chub kyi sems rab tu rgyas par bstan nas bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin de ma thag par gsal bar byas pa 'di kho na thabs dang bcas pa rgyas par ston par gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / byang chub kyi sems rab tu rgyas par bstan nas bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin de ma thag par gsal bar byas pa 'di kho na thabs dang bcas pa rgyas par ston par gsungs pa /
translated: Having taught the extensive thought of awakening, he declares that he will teach the nature of great bliss together with the method, just as it is, in the following verse.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //

original: gtan la phab par gyur pa ni nges pa ste nges pa'i don bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: gtan la phab par gyur pa ni nges pa ste nges pa'i don bde ba chen po'o //
translated: The ascertainment is the certainty, the meaning of which is great bliss.

original: ji ltar 'di nges pa'i don yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'di nges pa'i don yin zhe na /
translated: How is this the definitive meaning?

original: gsungs pa / mnyam nyid phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: gsungs pa / mnyam nyid phyir zhes pa /
translated: It is said, because of equality.

original: sems can rnams kun bde ba chen po byang chub kyi sems dang lhan cig ro gcig pa nyid kyi phyir te de'i bdag nyid kyi phyir zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: sems can rnams kun bde ba chen po byang chub kyi sems dang lhan cig ro gcig pa nyid kyi phyir te de'i bdag nyid kyi phyir zhes pa'i don to //
translated: because all sentient beings are of one taste with the great bliss of enlightenment, that is, because they have that nature.

original: de rtogs pa'i rten ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: de rtogs pa'i rten ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is the basis of that realization?

original: gru gsum bha ga dang chos 'byung dang sprul pa'i padma la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gru gsum bha ga dang chos 'byung dang sprul pa'i padma la sogs pa ste /
translated: The triangle of the bhaga, the dharma-source, the emanation-lotus, etc.

original: 'di la la la n'a dang ras n'a dang aa wa dh'u t'i'i gru gsum rnams so zhes byas nas so //üîΩrgya che ba rnams kyi ste stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa yon tan ma lus pa rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo phul du byung ba dang / @45a * //
analyzed: 'di la la la n'a dang ras n'a dang aa wa dh'u t'i'i gru gsum rnams so zhes byas nas so // rgya che ba rnams kyi ste stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa yon tan ma lus pa rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo phul du byung ba dang / @45a * //
translated: Here, some say that the three triangles of the lalana, the rasana, and the avadhuti.

original: ldan pa 'dir 'gyur ro zhes pas de dang ldan pa'i phyir de rgya che ba'i ngo bo can no //
analyzed: ldan pa 'dir 'gyur ro zhes pas de dang ldan pa'i phyir de rgya che ba'i ngo bo can no //
translated: The nature of the great, i.e., of all the qualities such as the powers and the fearlessnesses, is here, i.e., in the bhaga, and thus it is endowed with the nature of the great.

original: tshangs pa la sogs pa'i bar gyi lha dang lha min dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyi dbyer med pa'i bde ba chen po'i rten no //
analyzed: tshangs pa la sogs pa'i bar gyi lha dang lha min dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyi dbyer med pa'i bde ba chen po'i rten no //
translated: It is the basis of the great bliss of all sentient beings, including the gods and demigods up to Brahma.

original: 'o na mdo dang rgyud la sogs pa rnams su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na nges pa'i don du gsungs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na mdo dang rgyud la sogs pa rnams su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na nges pa'i don du gsungs pa ma yin nam /
translated: Well, in the sutras, tantras, and so forth, is not only the perfection of wisdom taught to be of definitive meaning?üîΩIs not great bliss not so?

original: bde ba chen po ni ma yin no zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: bde ba chen po ni ma yin no zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: de zhes pa nges pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes pa nges pa'o //
translated: That is ascertained.

original: kun rdzob pa'i rnam pa ni kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: kun rdzob pa'i rnam pa ni kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa ste /
translated: The aspect of the relative is color, shape, and so on.

original: de'i rang gi ngo bo dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rang gi ngo bo dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It is endowed with that nature.

original: 'di skad gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di skad gsungs te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: kun rdzob pa'i sngon po la sogs pa rnams bde ba'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: kun rdzob pa'i sngon po la sogs pa rnams bde ba'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The relative, such as blue, and so on, is the nature of bliss.

original: gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said:

original: bde ba sngon po bde ba ser //
analyzed: bde ba sngon po bde ba ser //
translated: Bliss is blue, bliss is yellow,

original: bde ba kun du ru skyes zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba kun du ru skyes zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: bliss is universal red, and so on.

original: bde ba yang byang chub kyi sems te /
analyzed: bde ba yang byang chub kyi sems te /
translated: Also, bliss is the bodhicitta.

original: de kho na shes rab pha rol phyin ma zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na shes rab pha rol phyin ma zhes pa'o //
translated: That is the perfection of wisdom.

original: de nyid kyi phyir kha cig tu btsun mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par brjod cing /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir kha cig tu btsun mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par brjod cing /

original: kha cig tu chos 'byung la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: kha cig tu chos 'byung la sogs pa'o //
translated: and in some places, the dharmodaya, and so on.

original: 'di'i phyir yang nges pa'i don te /
analyzed: 'di'i phyir yang nges pa'i don te /
translated: For this reason also it is of definitive meaning.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: For,

original: de nyid yul las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid yul las 'das pa'o //
translated: it is beyond the range of that.

original: don dam par yul du sgro btags pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: don dam par yul du sgro btags pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is free from the superimposition of an object in the ultimate.

original: srog chags kun gyi snying la ste sems la de'i bdag nyid kyis gnas shing srog chags rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: srog chags kun gyi snying la ste sems la de'i bdag nyid kyis gnas shing srog chags rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no //
translated: It abides in the heart, in the mind of all living beings, by its very nature, and living beings are of its very nature.

original: 'o na de kho na nyid ma rtogs pa'i gnas skabs su bde ba chen po nyams su ma myong ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na de kho na nyid ma rtogs pa'i gnas skabs su bde ba chen po nyams su ma myong ba ma yin nam /
translated: But is not the experience of great bliss not experienced when reality is not realized?

original: ci ltar sems can kun gyi sems kyi bdag nyid du brjod ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar sems can kun gyi sems kyi bdag nyid du brjod ce na /
translated: How can it be said to be the nature of the mind of all living beings?üîΩIt is because it is suitable to experience great bliss.

original: bde ba chen po nyams su myong bar rung ba nyid kyis so zhes rgyas pa dang bcas par gtan la 'bebs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bde ba chen po nyams su myong bar rung ba nyid kyis so zhes rgyas pa dang bcas par gtan la 'bebs par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is extensively established.

original: gal te de lta na sngags kyi theg pas ci ste /
analyzed: gal te de lta na sngags kyi theg pas ci ste /
translated: If that is so, what is the use of the mantra vehicle?

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la brten pa kho na las bya ba'i rang bzhin pha rol tu phyin pa drug goms pa rgyas pas byang chub 'thob pas so //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la brten pa kho na las bya ba'i rang bzhin pha rol tu phyin pa drug goms pa rgyas pas byang chub 'thob pas so //
translated: It is only by relying on the perfection vehicle that one attains enlightenment through the expansion of the practice of the six perfections, which are the nature of action.

original: gal te yang de bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin yin na de yang rab tu dga' ba'i sa nas rtsom mo zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: gal te yang de bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin yin na de yang rab tu dga' ba'i sa nas rtsom mo zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: If, however, it is the nature of great bliss, then it begins from the stage of the Joyous.üîΩHe says:

original: ci zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ci zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: What is the use of the extensive,üîΩfor you, O sharp-witted one,

original: khyod la ste rdo rje snying po shes rab rnon po la'o //
analyzed: khyod la ste rdo rje snying po shes rab rnon po la'o //
translated: the essence of the vajra?

original: rgyas pas ci zhig ste rgya che bas so //
analyzed: rgyas pas ci zhig ste rgya che bas so //
translated: What is the use of the extensive, i.e., of the extensive?

original: shes rab rno bas ni 'di las te byang chub kyi sems las so //
analyzed: shes rab rno bas ni 'di las te byang chub kyi sems las so //
translated: For you, O sharp-witted one, the essence of the vajra, i.e., the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ni 'dir bsdu'o zhes pa'am /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ni 'dir bsdu'o zhes pa'am /
translated: The perfections are included in this, i.e., in the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: bsdus pa'i ngo bo ni bsdus pa yin zhing @45b de las 'thob ste /
analyzed: bsdus pa'i ngo bo ni bsdus pa yin zhing @45b de las 'thob ste /
translated: Or, the essence of the included is the included, and it is obtained from that, i.e., from the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: byang chub sems kyi nang du 'dus pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po rnams bsgom pas yongs su rdzogs pa las so //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi nang du 'dus pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po rnams bsgom pas yongs su rdzogs pa las so //
translated: It is obtained from the perfection of the ten perfections included in the Thought of Enlightenment, by the cultivation of the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: de las ni gzhan gyi don bya ba lhun gyis grub pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de las ni gzhan gyi don bya ba lhun gyis grub pa kho na'o //
translated: From that, there is only the spontaneous performance of the aims of others.

original: sangs rgyas nyid ni sa bcu'i dbang phyug nyid do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid ni sa bcu'i dbang phyug nyid do //
translated: Buddhahood is the state of lordship over the ten stages.

original: rnam sangs rgyas nyid ni khyad par gyi lam 'thob pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam sangs rgyas nyid ni khyad par gyi lam 'thob pa nyid do //
translated: Enlightenment is the attainment of the special path.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid ni sa bcu gcig gi dbang phyug nyid do //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid ni sa bcu gcig gi dbang phyug nyid do //
translated: The state of a vajra-holder is the state of mastery of the eleventh stage.

original: 'khor los sgyur ba nyid ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dpag tu med pa sprul pa'i gtso bo nyid do //
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur ba nyid ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dpag tu med pa sprul pa'i gtso bo nyid do //
translated: The state of a universal monarch is the state of being the chief of the emanations of the immeasurable mandala wheels.

original: bskal pa kho na grangs med pa rnams dang bye ba rnams te de rnams kyis so //
analyzed: bskal pa kho na grangs med pa rnams dang bye ba rnams te de rnams kyis so //
translated: The immeasurable eons are the eons of countless and ten times countless.

original: bskal ba ni 'dir bskal pa chen po'o //üîΩde ltar ni ji tsam pa'i dus kyi tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams 'phel bar son pas tshe lo stong phrag brgyad cu par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: bskal ba ni 'dir bskal pa chen po'o // de ltar ni ji tsam pa'i dus kyi tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams 'phel bar son pas tshe lo stong phrag brgyad cu par 'gyur zhing /
translated: An eon is a great eon.

original: de las 'grib par gyur pa tshe lo bcu par te de tsam pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa'i dus ni bar gyi bskal pa'o //
analyzed: de las 'grib par gyur pa tshe lo bcu par te de tsam pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa'i dus ni bar gyi bskal pa'o //
translated: In this way, the eon of increase and decrease is the time it takes for the human lifespan to increase to eighty thousand years and then decrease to a lifespan of ten years.

original: bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cu ni bskal pa chen po'o //
analyzed: bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cu ni bskal pa chen po'o //
translated: Eighty of these eons of increase and decrease are a great eon.

original: de bzhin du bskal pa chen po gnas gzhan drug cur son pa'i grangs rjes su thob pa rnams ni grangs med pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de bzhin du bskal pa chen po gnas gzhan drug cur son pa'i grangs rjes su thob pa rnams ni grangs med pa zhes brjod do //
translated: In the same way, the eons of countless and ten times countless are so called because they are the number of eons that have passed since the beginning of the first countless eon.

original: grangs med pa kho na bzlas nas slar yang bgrangs pa ni grangs med pa gsum rnams te /
analyzed: grangs med pa kho na bzlas nas slar yang bgrangs pa ni grangs med pa gsum rnams te /
translated: And again, the three incalculable eons are the three incalculable eons of repetition.

original: de rnams kyis thob bya min pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la gnas pa rnams kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum rnams kyis de 'thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyis thob bya min pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la gnas pa rnams kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum rnams kyis de 'thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That which is not to be attained by them is to be attained by those abiding in the perfection vehicle in three incalculable eons.

original: de la bskal pa grangs med pa dang pos tshogs kyis nas brtsams nas ji srid sa dang po'i bar rdzogs par byed cing /
analyzed: de la bskal pa grangs med pa dang pos tshogs kyis nas brtsams nas ji srid sa dang po'i bar rdzogs par byed cing /
translated: In the first incalculable eon, they complete the accumulations beginning from the stage of engagement through belief up to the first stage.

original: gnyis pas ni dri ma med pa la sogs pas drug rnams te /
analyzed: gnyis pas ni dri ma med pa la sogs pas drug rnams te /
translated: In the second, they complete the six stages, beginning with the stainless stage.

original: gsum pas sa mi g-yo ba nas brtsams te sangs rgyas kyis ji srid pa'o //
analyzed: gsum pas sa mi g-yo ba nas brtsams te sangs rgyas kyis ji srid pa'o //
translated: In the third, they complete the stages from the immovable stage up to buddhahood.

original: bskal pa bye ba rnams kyis kyang thob bya min pa ni /
analyzed: bskal pa bye ba rnams kyis kyang thob bya min pa ni /
translated: That which is not to be attained in a hundred million eons is

original: brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyang bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis pa kho na la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyang bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis pa kho na la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because those endowed with great diligence attain manifest complete enlightenment in just two incalculable eons.

original: khyod ces pa ji ltar zhes nye bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: khyod ces pa ji ltar zhes nye bar byed pa ste /
translated: You is a vocative.

original: ji ltar khyod skye ba 'di kho na la sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa 'thob pa de ltar du zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar khyod skye ba 'di kho na la sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa 'thob pa de ltar du zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It means just as you attain buddhahood and so on in this very life, so do it!

original: 'di skad bshad de /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad de /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul can gyi byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen pos 'bad bzhin pa'i @46a * //
analyzed: ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul can gyi byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen pos 'bad bzhin pa'i @46a * //
translated: Just as bodhisattvas who follow the perfection vehicle strive with great effort

original: bskal pa mang po rnams ldog pa ste /
analyzed: bskal pa mang po rnams ldog pa ste /
